pontoon-data/Pontoon

open source tool for syncing data to customer warehouses

View on index

Related repos

  • Open source platform for building customer data pipelines and syncing events to your data warehouse
  • Syncs data between warehouses and cloud tools
  • Database API that syncs with spreadsheets
  • open-source BI tool for easy data analysis and dashboards
  • integrated data lake and catalog format built on SQL and Parquet
  • Real-time data replication between databases
  • Self-hosted trail database for GPS data
  • open-source tool for syncing data from lots of sources
  • open source BI and data viz system originally built at Yandex
